title: TTT Comprehensive Authoritarian Consolidation Timeline Analysis
description:
Comprehensive timeline analysis synthesizing all corruption patterns from TTT Batch 6 articles (226-269) to map authoritarian consolidation progression.

Research Focus:
- Chronological progression of institutional capture across all sectors
- Escalation patterns and acceleration mechanisms
- Critical juncture analysis and turning points
- Resistance effectiveness and failure analysis
- International coordination and foreign influence
- Legal and constitutional norm breakdown progression
- Public response and democratic resilience patterns

This meta-analysis will synthesize findings from all other TTT research priorities to create definitive authoritarian consolidation timeline.

Builds on: Federal worker targeting, DOJ weaponization, military politicization, election capture, oversight obstruction, media suppression, and systematic coordination research.
methodology: Pattern analysis across multiple corruption incidents
